ticket.title: Fix rake 0.8.2 warning
ticket.original-body:
After upgrading to rake 0.8.2 (which I had to install manually btw) I saw warning after each command, like: 
rake notes
(in /Users/kain/Sites/mysite)
/Users/kain/Sites/mysite/config/../vendor/rails/railties/lib/rails/gem_dependency.rb:36: warning: `*' interpreted as argument prefix
Attached patch attempts to fix the issue.

version.title: Fix rake 0.8.2 warning

version.body: Seems like this was fixed by [2bf58aa782d3b493f2d98f153324b93c5b058ba6](http://github.com/rails/rails/commit/2bf58aa782d3b493f2d98f153324b93c5b058ba6) which extensively gem_dependency.rb
